title: Problem logging in
body: When I try log in with my main account (this one), it takes an extremely long time. If I am able to log in, the chat does not connect and people cannot see me online. However, I have no issues logging in with my lvl 7 account. What's the go?

replies.body: I cannot connect as well. What is going on Riot?
I can't log in either, but this time with any of my accounts.
I have tried repairing the client. Still not logging in.
Also I can only log in with my main immediately after logging into my low level account. Still doesn't connect to chat though.
